data.name: lblContacto5
data.value: Send an email to customer service for assistance. In general, representatives respond to inquiries within one business day.

data.name: lblContacto8
data.value: Fast, easy and hassle free! Chat with a customer service representative and quickly get to PAX the answers you need.

data.name: lblTextoAppEscritorio
data.value: An application is a computer program that is used as a tool for a specific task or operation. It is also said unlike other programs such as operating systems, programming languages ​​and others, the application has the single largest order to perform a specific task, often basic and quick and easy use for advanced home user. The Reason The most common reason for the creation of a computer application is the need to solve a problem or to simplify a complex operation.

data.name: lblTextoAppMoviles
data.value:
We develop mobile applications perfect for installing your company or your brand with the features you require their services to their customers can install on your phone and use them when needed.
Our applications allow access from a mobile device to all information whether corporate or personal use you want to move, such as product catalogs and pricing, sales force systems, entertainment or any textual information being programmed on all mobile platforms currently present.

data.name: lblTextoAppWeb
data.value:
In software engineering is called Web application tools that users can use a web server accessed via the Internet or an intranet using a browser. In other words, is a software application that is coded in a language supported by web browsers in which execution is entrusted to the browser.
Web applications are popular because the practical Web Browser as thin client, regardless of the operating system and the ease to update and maintain web applications without distributing and installing software to thousands of potential users.

data.name: lblTextoDesarrolloDeSW
data.value: Development of custom software based on Microsoft technologies and SQL databases. Developments generate based on the needs of each client, taking a goal of complete satisfaction with the quality of the final product. Our main approaches are to develop both desktop and web platforms, can provide accommodation to them with our own infrastructure.

data.name: lbltxtContacto
data.value: At PAX we want your opinion!

data.name: lblpoliticasdesc
data.value:
To use certain services or access certain content, you must provide certain data
This security policy outlines the proper conditions of use on this site. By accessing the site,
you consent to data collection and use practices described in this privacy statement.
Personal Data Protection
Personal information is any information that identifies you or by which your identity could be deduced.
personal, which will only be used for the purpose they were collected.
The type of information that he may be requested includes, without limitation,
name, RFC, e-mail address (e-mail), street, hometown, zip code,
among others, not all information requested at time of entry into the binding site is
provided, except that we deem appropriate so that you know. how to start
Overall, this site will not share or disclose information except when authorized by you,
or in the following cases:
• When requested by a competent authority and after fulfilling the corresponding legal proceedings.
• Where in the opinion of this site is necessary to enforce the terms of use and other terms of this page
or to protect the integrity of other users or the site.
Personal information collected on this site will be used to operate the Site and to provide
services or carry out the transactions you request. To support such applications, PAX can be used
personal information to provide a more effective customer service and provide information
important product or service that is being used, including critical updates
and notifications. Additionally, we may send you information about other products and services PAX
PAX is committed to protecting the security of your personal information. We use very different technologies and
security procedures to help protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure
unauthorized. For example, we store the personal information that is provided to us on servers
computer with limited access that are located in controlled facilities.
Once collected your personal details are stored on the server in encrypted form along with other measures
additional protection. However you must take responsibility for the use of your account and password
keeping it private and not making it available to third parties.
All information provided must be truthful. For these purposes, you guarantee the authenticity of all
data communicated as a result of completing the necessary forms for subscription
Services, access to content or restricted areas of the site. In any case you will be solely responsible
for any false or inaccurate statements made and the damage caused to this site or others by
the information provided.
You agree to act responsibly at this site and to treat other visitors with respect.
In case of cancellation of a customer service PAX, the privacy practices of information mentioned
above are still valid. The information will be deleted from our systems according to
regulated by the tax authority for these cases.
PAX update this policy in cases that required according to changes in legislation. in these
cases our clients will be informed well in advance.

data.name: lblTerminosyCondiciones
data.value:
Take time to review the Terms of Use, because the mere use of the Website is committed
unreservedly to comply.
PAX reserves the right to amend without notice these Terms of Use and the contract that these
suppose, merely by updating this posting.
All the material on the site, which does not correspond to a third party, constitute intellectual property and exclusive PAX.
A limitation, be construed as including the text, software, names, logos, trademarks,
trademarks, trade names, images, photographs, drawings, music and video.
PAX reserves all rights to such materials, does not yield in favor of or transfer any rights on
their intellectual property or third parties. Consequently, the user can download content only for your
personal use, never for commercial purposes, provided that you retain all copyright messages, property
and trademarks, no modifications are made to them, not make use of the contents in a
that appears to be linked to any of our products, services, events or brands, and content is not stored
in a database, server, or personal computer for reuse for commercial purposes.
However, you may not, under any circumstances, copy, reproduce, publish, both physically and
electronically, transmit or distribute content online, unless you have requested and obtained in writing
our express permission. Nor can add, delete, distort or misrepresent any content on the Web PAX.
It expressly prohibits any attempt to modify any Online Material, or to defeat or circumvent our
security. The user agrees to use the contents in a proper and lawful and is not authorized to redistribute or sell
the material or to reverse engineer, decompile or disassemble the software, or make any
other form that people can use a third party.
Limitation of Liability
PAX excludes all liability for damages of any kind that may arise from the transmission,
dissemination, storage, availability, reception or access to content, and in particular
though not exclusively, for damages that may result from (a) violation of the law,
morals and generally accepted customs or public order as a result of the transmission, distribution,
storage, availability, reception or access to content;
(b) the infringement of intellectual property, contractual commitments of any
class, the rights to honor, personal and family privacy and image of people's rights
property and all other rights belonging to third parties as a result of the transmission, distribution,
storage, availability, reception or access to content, (c) engaging in acts
unfair competition and illegal advertising as a result of the transmission, distribution, storage,
available, reception or access to content, (d) the lack of truthfulness, accuracy, completeness,
relevance and / or timeliness of the content, (e) inadequate for any kind of purpose and fraud
expectations generated by the contents f) the faults and defects of all types of broadcast content,
distributed, stored, made ​​available or otherwise transmitted or made available, received, obtained
or is accessed through the website or services.
Termination of This Agreement
PAX may terminate this agreement at any time, without notice, in the case that
at its sole discretion, you breach any of the conditions.

data.name: lblTextoSeguridadApp
data.value: Application security is becoming increasingly important due to the growing need for organizations to transact online. Therefore, protecting Web applications against hacking attempts has become paramount need to operate a successful business online. The attempt would fail: financial loss, legal complications and even, could negatively impact the reputation of your organization. Today, there are several requirements (PCI-DSS, Sarbanes-Oxley, GLBA and HIPAA), which can help protect their customers' confidential data from theft or mismanagement.

data.name: lblTextoServWindows
data.value: A Windows service is not a normal Windows application, as it has no graphical interface for the user and there is a kind of Web Service running on Windows rather than a website. Windows Services are applications that run without interacting directly with the user and usually start with the system without any user having to start it.

data.name: lblTextoWebService
data.value: It is a technology that uses a set of protocols and standards used for exchanging data between applications. Different software applications developed in different programming languages​​, and executed on any platform, can use web services to exchange data over computer networks like the Internet. Interoperability is achieved by adopting open standards.
